page.title: 18Youth Organisations
page.content: The youth organisations in this area consist of Baxenden St John's Guides Scouts Brownies and Cubs at Baxenden School.In Baxenden at Hollins school are summer youth clubs,badminton and table tennis clubs. In Accrington at the institute across from Benjamin Hargreaves School are St Paul's Guides Brownies cubs and scouts.On a sunday night they also have a youth club.Also at Cambridge Street they have Guides and Brownies.Mary Magdalen's also have Guides and Brownies .They all in Accrington. The youth clubs in this area are the Faces and the New Era.The New Era has an indoor football pitch,a disco,slot machines and a television there are also two snooker tables. The public think that the youths around the age of 13 should have a lot more youth clubs.
